author: Unreal Engine
description:
Software Engineer Sara Batista from Platige Image is joining us in Stockholm to talk about how the studio's custom anamorphic lens system was used alongside UE in the Witcher 4 Cinematic Reveal Trailer.

The session will explore how Platige Image and CD PROJEKT RED pushed the boundaries of real-time rendering to achieve cinematic fidelity without compromising performance.
title: Unreal Fest Stockholm Meet the Presenter: Sara
